duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of Systems Engineering Managers and provide support to Systems Engineers in generating growth within Major Accounts.
Oversee technical pre-sales operations and achieve revenue generation and organizational quotas.
Interact at a senior level with customers and partners, providing valuable insight into industry trends, customer challenges, and technical evolutions.
Develop and execute outcome-oriented Systems Engineering initiatives that drive pipeline and sales within the Area.
Maintain strong relationships with Palo Alto Networks' partners and lead portfolio expansion initiatives.
Ensure effective account planning is executed across the teams to deliver compelling business-focused solutions that address customers' security needs.
Provide account support through SE assignments, load balancing, continuity, strategic planning with Sales management, Sales Reps, and SEs, and customer meetings.
Operate effectively in a matrix manner with extended teams such as Support, Finance, and Product Management.
Act as an escalation point for pre-sales and post-sales technical issues in the territory.
Develop, mentor, manage, and support reporting sales engineers with technical and organizational leadership.
Manage successful evaluations and timely return of evaluation equipment.

education_certification.credential: A minimum combination of 8 years of first and/or second line, Systems Engineering management experience preferred. Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
